directions: Pulse pickles, celery, onion, and pickle juice together in a food processor until evenly chopped; add chickpeas and pulse until beans are roughly chopped. Transfer mixture to a bowl.
Stir oats into chickpeas mixture until well mixed. Add mayonnaise and mustard; stir well. Let sit for flavors to blend, about 10 minutes.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can chickpeas (garbanzo beans), drained and rinsed
title: No Tuna Salad
